result.execSummary:
The defendant Walter P Froemming was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Aggravated Battery-Intend GreatBod. Harm, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(5).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Restitution paid in full from bond posted.
Court costs paid in full from bond posted.

-Absolute sobriety.
-No controlled substances or prescription medication unless prescribed by physician and in conformity with said prescription.
-No contact with Lisa Spina, her residence or employment.
-If agent feels appropriate, defendant to attend sex offender counseling.
-Submit DNA sample.
-Pay supervision fees.
